name: Friendly Bunny Mochi
description:
FRIENDLY BUNNY MOCHI is the sequel to LONELY WOLF TREAT. this story follows mochi on her mission to get everyone to be friends... even a fox who's very insistent on eating her for dinner.
it's another 20-40 minute little game made in about 3 weeks. there's an optional sidequest this time around, but still only one ending.
you can find more of my work HERE and hey if you're into my stuff and want to throw money at me, maybe support me on patreon!
thanks, please enjoy! <3333
~ CREDITS ~
art+story+music - NomnomNamispecial thanks to tryph and Kayla Grimes for letting me borrow their OCs!
translations: KyleHeren (korean),  black board (thai), npckc (japanese), Nam Hoàng (vietnamese)
